Congress. On Dec. 10, Bernie Sanders , an independent, took the floor of the Senate and didn't relinquish it for 8 1/2 hours. Mr David Cameron said: I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so. " Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government. The statement comes just days after the prime minister refused to deny reports that Mr Andy Coulson had already offered his resignation.
